column4: hi all.  quick question.  im currently running karmic as dual boot, with that nasty M$ software, but need to unfortunately use it until I get a particular programme working under WINE. What I'd like to know is two fold.  firstly, how can i install hista in a VM without an actual install CD, just the recovery partition on my laptop, and secondly, can i then turn my dual boot install into a single boot install without having to reinstall ?
the second one, you can of course turn it into single boot by deleting the vista partition and reasign the free space to ubuntu
but of course, make a backup first
